equation.docs:
The saturated vapor pressure equation to use (see below).

*See also: [Absolute Humidity](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/absolute_humidity.html#configuration-variables)*

humidity.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The sensor that is used to measure the current relative humidity, in %.

*See also: [Absolute Humidity](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/absolute_humidity.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The sensor that is used to measure the current temperature, in °C.

*See also: [Absolute Humidity](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/absolute_humidity.html#configuration-variables)*
